external_games.name: You Will Thank Me as Fast as You Thank a Werewolf

name: You Will Thank Me as Fast as You Thank a Werewolf
summary: This work is a collaboration with GPT-2, a neural network model designed to predict the next word in a block of given text based on its study of eight million web pages. In this application, I input a text file of my own prose from the past twenty years into GPT-2. It then generated new writing in a similar style. I selected, arranged, and lightly edited the resulting output.
